title: Bug 6009: New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard for creating nested classes, the context is not correctly set.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the new class wizard. 
2. Select the option to create a nested class. 
3. Follow the wizard steps to complete the creation process. 
4. Verify that the context is set correctly.
